TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Koyo, title = Koyo, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Koyo} }

S.FORM: Koyo Itiniay i Ruisui Cen no Hualien ko Koyo a niyaro', 424 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 976 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 29% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 283 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 71% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 693 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 20%, 撒奇拉雅族1%, Truku 3%, Tayal 3%, Bunun 1%, roma 1%.

Koyo Itiniay i Roisoi Cen no Hoalien ko Koyo a niyaro', 424 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 976 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 29% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 283 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 71% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 693 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 20%, 撒奇拉雅族1%, Troko 3%, Tayal 3%, Bonon 1%, roma 1%.
